amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Homeland Security to study select foreign rail security practices, and the cost and feasibility of implementing selected best practices that are not currently used in the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 110-74 to require the Secretary of Homeland Security to study foreign rail security practices that are not currently used in the U.S. and submit a report on recommendations for implementing such practices.
